alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 2:43PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 315 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Bitter Creek Rest Area, or 26 miles east of Rock Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bitter Creek Rest Area around 300 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 139 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
